channel.title: Oh my god
channel.description: does anyone know what this means Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Gui Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Gui at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: Gui. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . . bescause this is coming from my run.bat file when i try to run it foxownage told me how to edit it so i could play but now it doesent work at all thanks alot :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad:

item.title: Oh my god
item.dc:creator: @billyjr33 billyjr33
item.description:
@billyjr33 wrote:

this means that your run.bat cant find the gui.java so you might not have a gui.java or if you do move the run.bat next to it hoped i helped.

item.title: Oh my god
item.dc:creator: @superpersonxd superpersonxd
item.description:
@superpersonxd wrote:

[quote=“momo man, post:1, topic:327809”]does anyone know what this means
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Gui
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Gui
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
Could not find the main class: Gui. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .
bescause this is coming from my run.bat file when i try to run it foxownage told me how to edit it so i could play but now it doesent work at all thanks alot :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad:[/quote]

This means there is no GUI java can load, it means its missing or your desktop variables or incorrect.

Read full topic

[quote=“momo man, post:10, topic:327809”]what did u just say?
you cant help no more?
welll you the won that answered to all my replys and answered my questions and so cause thiss mess so you cant just bail out now you caused it
so fix it. you should not be a senior member in the first place you dont know how to help people and so all you have done today is screw up my client and now it is unusable unless someone fixes it and that someone is you.got it?[/quote]

Senior member doesn’t mean shit, it just means you’ve posted enough. If you actually read any tutorials or anything regarding java, you wouldn’t be half as pathetic as you are.

item.title: Oh my god
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

momo man:

the only thing he was trying to do was mess up my client

All right first thing, IT IS NOT MY FAULT YOU ARE RETARDED. Your client is not messed up it’s just your run.bat is not compatible with your OS you idiot. If you didn’t just come on this forum and say “I want to learn to code so instead of learning how through online tutorials, i’m going to pester people over and over and over” you wouldn’t be in this ‘crisis’. I don’t know how to make a run.bat compatible with Windows 7 Ultimate (which you should’ve told everyone earlier you were using it), I use Windows 7 Home Premium and I made my own run.bat to be compatible with my client. If you can’t make one I quote:

YOU ARE RETARDED
Get off this forum and go and learn how to code, and before you come back to MoparScape please learn how to speak english.
Quotes of your stupidity (LoLo Quotes):
freind
gic=ve
give no advice to ya freinds
(Horrible grammar)
somone
[quote="momo man, post:10, topic:327809"]what did u just say? you cant help no more? welll you the won that answered to all my replys and answered my questions and so cause thiss mess so you cant just bail out now you caused it so fix it. you should not be a senior member in the first place you dont know how to help people and so all you have done today is screw up my client and now it is unusable unless someone fixes it and that someone is you.got it?[/quote] ( He's saying I messed up his client because he can't get his run.bat to work LMAO ) [quote="momo man, post:16, topic:327809"]the only thing he was trying to do was mess up my client[/quote] [quote="momo man, post:3, topic:327789"]***********(In this quote I told him to edit his batch file and put in a code I told him to)***********

how do i do that im a noob lol
im new
no brain just storage space :p[/quote]

[quote=“momo man, post:17, topic:327789”](This was when I said it couldn’t find Gui)

still dosent work and how to i find gui so it will work again?[/quote]

[quote=“momo man, post:7, topic:327789”]i dont know anything
but by the bat file you mean run.bat?
how can i paste soming in that it just says welcome and server is now running tried to paste but u cant see writing or anything[/quote]

This is odd

where is construction.bat?

[quote=“Fox0wnage, post:8, topic:327789”]Yes run.bat if that’s what is used to open your client.
You can do that like this

@echo off echo Welcome to YourServer's Client! echo The client is running... title Construct cls "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui pause

Then he says:

do you mean client.java?[/quote]
And next time, please don’t overreact over your pixels. By the way your grammar is really bad lol even for a normal person.
I keep finding more hilarious quotes by the minute.

Read full topic

item.title: Oh my god
item.dc:creator: @Trent1 Trent!!
item.description:
@Trent1 wrote:

[quote=“Fox0wnage, post:12, topic:327809”][quote author=momo man link=topic=424197.msg3115377#msg3115377 date=1264912818]
what did u just say?
you cant help no more?
welll you the won that answered to all my replys and answered my questions and so cause thiss mess so you cant just bail out now you caused it
so fix it. you should not be a senior member in the first place you dont know how to help people and so all you have done today is screw up my client and now it is unusable unless someone fixes it and that someone is you.got it?
[/quote]

What mess are you talking about? I don’t own your computer so I can’t make the code for myself. It’d be easier if I was using the computer itself. But if you can’t make a simple client runner then quit coding immediately. I can’t help it if you fail so much as to not be able to create one. Nobody’s screwed up your client except for you. Your asking people how to edit batch files and why your run.bat can’t find your JDK and etc… maybe you should learn before you try coding. And for the record that someone isn’t me, and also it isn’t unusable it’s just a matter of common sense which you seem to be lacking.

Good luck with your client and I feel bad for anybody else that tries to help you or even plays your server.[/quote]

i agree with fox.
you’re clearly an amateur, and you should probably research this kind of stuff more before you come onto a forum and flame people for trying to help you.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“momo man, post:10, topic:327809”]what did u just say?
you cant help no more?
welll you the won that answered to all my replys and answered my questions and so cause thiss mess so you cant just bail out now you caused it
so fix it. you should not be a senior member in the first place you dont know how to help people and so all you have done today is screw up my client and now it is unusable unless someone fixes it and that someone is you.got it?[/quote]

What mess are you talking about? I don’t own your computer so I can’t make the code for myself. It’d be easier if I was using the computer itself. But if you can’t make a simple client runner then quit coding immediately. I can’t help it if you fail so much as to not be able to create one. Nobody’s screwed up your client except for you. Your asking people how to edit batch files and why your run.bat can’t find your JDK and etc… maybe you should learn before you try coding. And for the record that someone isn’t me, and also it isn’t unusable it’s just a matter of common sense which you seem to be lacking.

Good luck with your client and I feel bad for anybody else that tries to help you or even plays your server.
